languages.text: "Лишнего сболтнул. Вы уж простите — нервы. Нервы. Как там она — на Веабосе-то, в рудниках да в кандалах? Бедная, бедная моя Илэна! Хрупкий цветочек. Легкие-то у нее слабые, понимаете? Кашляет постоянно. А в рудниках что? Пыль да грязь. Не выдержит она, ох не выдержит! Оправдали-то ее еще два года назад. А бумаги заверить, печать поставить? Столько времени утекло... А теперь еще стой да жди. Ну ничего, ничего... Если будем так же двигаться — циклов через десять и до нас дойдет очередь".

traits.locale_text: "Лишнего сболтнул. Вы уж простите — нервы. Нервы. Как там она — на Веабосе-то, в рудниках да в кандалах? Бедная, бедная моя Илэна! Хрупкий цветочек. Легкие-то у нее слабые, понимаете? Кашляет постоянно. А в рудниках что? Пыль да грязь. Не выдержит она, ох не выдержит! Оправдали-то ее еще два года назад. А бумаги заверить, печать поставить? Столько времени утекло... А теперь еще стой да жди. Ну ничего, ничего... Если будем так же двигаться — циклов через десять и до нас дойдет очередь".
traits.speaker: AdministratumMenas

languages.text: "I've said too much. I do apologise — it's my nerves. My nerves. I just keep thinking about her there on Vheabos, shackled down in the mines. My poor, poor Ilena! As delicate as a flower, she is. She's got weak lungs, you understand? Always coughing. And her now down the mines? All that dust and muck? She won't cope with it, she won't! She was acquitted two years ago. But to get the papers certified, and the seal? So much time has passed... And now here I am, standing, waiting. It doesn't matter. At the rate this queue's moving, it'll be ten cycles or more before our numbers come up."
languages.original_text: "Лишнего сболтнул. Вы уж простите — нервы. Нервы. Как там она — на Веабосе-то, в рудниках да в кандалах? Бедная, бедная моя Илэна! Хрупкий цветочек. languages.text: “我有点说过头了，我真的很抱歉。那都是在瞎说，瞎说而已。我只是在想我的女儿，她被关在维博斯，被铐在矿井里。我可怜的伊莲娜！她就像鲜花一样娇嫩。她的肺不好，你懂的吧？她总是咳嗽，可她现在却被关在了矿井里？要呼吸那么多灰尘和泥土？她受不了，她绝对受不了！她本该两年前就无罪释放了，可她依然被关在里面，就因为我没弄到认证和印章，你敢相信吗？这么长时间过去了……而我却站在这里，一直在等着。算了，这已经不重要了。总之，按照这个队伍现在的速度，恐怕我们至少要等上十个周期，才能等到叫号。”
languages.original_text: "I've said too much. I do apologise — it's my nerves. My nerves. I just keep thinking about her there on Vheabos, shackled down in the mines. My poor, poor Ilena! As delicate as a flower, she is. She's got weak lungs, you understand? Always coughing. And her now down the mines? All that dust and muck? She won't cope with it, she won't! She was acquitted two years ago. But to get the papers certified, and the seal? So much time has passed... And now here I am, standing, waiting. It doesn't matter. At the rate this queue's moving, it'll be ten cycles or more before our numbers come up."

traits.speaker: AdministratumMenas

languages.text: «He dicho algo que no debía. Lo lamento; son los nervios. Los nervios. No dejo de pensar en ella, en Vheabos, encadenada en las minas. ¡Mi pobre Ilena! Es tan delicada como una florecilla. Tiene los pulmones débiles, ¿sabe? Siempre está tosiendo. ¿Y la mandan a las minas? ¿Con todo el polvo y el barro? ¡No lo soportará, lo sé! La absolvieron hace dos años, pero ¿la certificación y el sello de los papeles? Ha pasado tantísimo tiempo... Y aquí estoy, esperando de pie. No importa. Con el ritmo que lleva la cola, pasarán diez ciclos o más antes de que digan nuestros números».
languages.original_text: "I've said too much. I do apologise — it's my nerves. My nerves. I just keep thinking about her there on Vheabos, shackled down in the mines. My poor, poor Ilena! As delicate as a flower, she is. She's got weak lungs, you understand? Always coughing. And her now down the mines? All that dust and muck? She won't cope with it, she won't! She was acquitted two years ago. But to get the papers certified, and the seal? So much time has passed... And now here I am, standing, waiting. It doesn't matter. At the rate this queue's moving, it'll be ten cycles or more before our numbers come up."

Con el ritmo que lleva la cola, pasarán diez ciclos o más antes de que digan nuestros números».
traits.speaker: AdministratumMenas

languages.text: 「喋りすぎたな、すまん…気が高ぶってるんだ。ピリピリしてる。ヴィアボスの坑道で枷をはめられてるだろう娘のことばかり考えちまうんだ。かわいそうなイリーナ！花みたいに繊細な子なんだ。肺を病んじまってる、分かるだろ？いつも咳をしてるんだ。それが今は坑道にいるんだぞ？ちりと土でいっぱいの場所にだと？何とかしたくても、イリーナにはどうにもできない！2年前に無罪放免になったんだが、書類に認証と印鑑がいるだと？それでこんなにも時間が経っちまった…そういうわけで俺は今ここで立って、待ってる。どうでもよくなっちまう。この列の動く速さじゃ俺らの番は10周期以上先さ」
languages.original_text: "I've said too much. I do apologise — it's my nerves. My nerves. I just keep thinking about her there on Vheabos, shackled down in the mines. My poor, poor Ilena! A delicate as a flower, she is. She's got weak lungs, you understand? Always coughing. And her now down the mines? All that dust and muck? She won't cope with it, she won't! She was acquitted two years ago. But to get the papers certified, and the seal? So much time has passed... And now here I am, standing, waiting. It doesn't matter. At the rate this queue's moving, it'll be ten cycles or more before our numbers come up."

traits.speaker: AdministratumMenas

languages.text: « J'en ai trop dit. Je vous prie de bien vouloir m'excuser, ce sont les nerfs qui lâchent. Et pour cause... Je n'arrête pas de penser à elle, toute seule sur Vhéabos, à trimer comme un forçat dans les mines. Ma pauvre Ilena ! C'est une petite fleur délicate, elle a les poumons fragiles, vous comprenez ? Déjà qu'elle est sujette à de terribles quintes de toux, avec la poussière et les miasmes qui polluent l'air confiné des souterrains, elle est condamnée à une mort certaine ! Elle a été acquittée il y a deux ans, mais encore faut-il faire authentifier les documents et obtenir le cachet officiel. Ça fait si longtemps que j'attends mon tour. Malheureusement, au rythme auquel avance cette file d'attente, nous y serons encore dans dix cycles au bas mot. »
languages.original_text: "I've said too much. I do apologise — it's my nerves. My nerves. I just keep thinking about her there on Vheabos, shackled down in the mines. My poor, poor Ilena! As delicate as a flower, she is. She's got weak lungs, you understand? Always coughing. And her now down the mines? All that dust and muck? She won't cope with it, she won't! She was acquitted two years ago. But to get the papers certified, and the seal? So much time has passed... And now here I am, standing, waiting. It doesn't matter. At the rate this queue's moving, it'll be ten cycles or more before our numbers come up."

Malheureusement, au rythme auquel avance cette file d'attente, nous y serons encore dans dix cycles au bas mot. »
traits.speaker: AdministratumMenas

languages.text: "Ich habe schon zu viel gesagt. Entschuldigung – das sind die Nerven. Die Nerven. Ich muss einfach ständig an sie denken, wie sie auf Vheabos in Ketten in den Minen arbeitet. Meine arme, arme Ilena! Dabei ist sie so ein zartes Pflänzchen. Und schwache Lungen hat sie auch, wisst Ihr. Ständig hustet sie. Und jetzt da unten in den Minen? Bei dem vielen Staub und Dreck? Sie wird es nicht schaffen, bestimmt nicht! Vor zwei Jahren wurde sie freigesprochen. Aber bis die Papiere zertifiziert sind und das Siegel besorgt ist? Es ist so viel Zeit vergangen ... Und jetzt stehe ich hier und warte. Es spielt keine Rolle. Bei dem Tempo dieser Schlange dauert es zehn Zyklen oder mehr, bis unsere Nummer drankommt."
languages.original_text: "I've said too much. I do apologise — it's my nerves. My nerves. I just keep thinking about her there on Vheabos, shackled down in the mines. My poor, poor Ilena! As delicate as a flower, she is. She's got weak lungs, you understand? Always coughing. And her now down the mines? All that dust and muck? She won't cope with it, she won't! At the rate this queue's moving, it'll be ten cycles or more before our numbers come up."

traits.speaker: AdministratumMenas

languages.text: "Tutamadım ağzımı. Özür dilerim... Sinirlerim laçka olmuş. Hep sinirden. Kızımın Vheabos'taki hâlini düşünüp duruyorum. Madenlerde tutsak. Ah, zavallı İlena'm! Çiçek gibi narindir o. Ciğerleri zayıf, anlıyor musunuz? Hep öksürüyor. Hele bir de madenlere attılar ya onu... Tozlu ve pis değil midir orası? Kızım dayanamaz buna, dayanamaz! İki yıl önce beraat etti. Peki o kâğıtları tasdik ettirmek, mühürletmek kolay mı? Çok zaman geçti... Bakın buradayım, duruyorum, bekliyorum. Hiç önemi yok. Kuyruk öyle yavaş ilerliyor ki sıra bana gelene kadar on döngüden fazla zaman geçer."
languages.original_text: "I've said too much. I do apologise — it's my nerves. My nerves. I just keep thinking about her there on Vheabos, shackled down in the mines. My poor, poor Ilena! As delicate as a flower, she is. She's got weak lungs, you understand? Always coughing. And her now down the mines? All that dust and muck? She won't cope with it, she won't! She was acquitted two years ago. But to get the papers certified, and the seal? So much time has passed... And now here I am, standing, waiting. It doesn't matter. At the rate this queue's moving, it'll be ten cycles or more before our numbers come up."
